name: FG_SC_LAND_SEA_COAST1
description: Distance from coast to gridpoint is less than threshold Max1 in file AUX_DISTAN

name: FG_SC_LAND_SEA_COAST2
description: Distance from coast to gridpoint is less than threshold Max2 in file AUX_DISTAN

name: FG_SC_TEC_GRADIENT
description: High TEC gradient along dwell for a grid point

name: FG_SC_IN_CLIM_ICE
description: Gridpoint with maximum extend of sea ice accordy to monthly climatology

name: FG_SC_ICE
description: Ice concentration at gridpoint is above threshold Tg_ice_concentration

name: FG_SC_RAIN
description: Heavy rain suspected on gridpoint. Rain rate is above threshold Tg_max_rainfall
